title: Pinout of Home Button Connector? iPad 8 Wifi, torn pads A2270
message:
I have a iPad 8th gen,  A2270 and some monster pulled a few pads off trying to replace home button zif connector. I started scraping to see if I can follow the traces. They are not clearly seen through the mask like I see some show.

Didn't want to start tearing all the mask off, and figure someone has seen this. Do we know where these traces go to ? Does it even use all the traces? iPad 8 seems to be the only ipad I don't have info on. Here is a pic of what I have under the microscope.

title: Pinout of Home Button Connector? iPad 8 Wifi, torn pads A2270
message:
I don't have schematic, nor boardview on my PC.
This screenshot is from XinZhiZao server.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Afvm4CNdtUITXDIFXlis3klB7lVhnmdW/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

title: Pinout of Home Button Connector? iPad 8 Wifi, torn pads A2270
message:
Thanks for sending what you can.  I have nothing to find the other end.  I would like to fix the traces as it seems easiest (I would imagine anyway)

 I just don't see what direction they go, or where they end up?

title: Pinout of Home Button Connector? iPad 8 Wifi, torn pads A2270
Pinout of Home Button Connector? iPad 8 Wifi, torn pads A2270
message:
Oddly enough, the pads that lifted are not used. The half pads I was able to use and were still connected.   I believe I'm good, I'll assembly and test.  Purchased ZXW to confirm pin location to components. They ohm out, so I may just have lucked out being able to repair.  I'll double check with what you sent.

 Again thanks !
